content.raw:
When spawning URDF model (Baxter) using the spawn_model python -> gazebo_ros_api_plugin.cpp -> Gazebo, I get the following seg fault:

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff3ffff700 (LWP 9249)]
0x00007ffff7689700 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateVisuals(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff7689700 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateVisuals(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#1  0x00007ffff768fd71 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateLink(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>, gazebo::math::Pose&) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#2  0x00007ffff76903ab in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateSDF(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>, gazebo::math::Pose const&) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#3  0x00007ffff769420a in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::InitModelString(std::string const&, bool) () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#4  0x00007ffff766f0bc in sdf::readString(std::string const&, boost::shared_ptr<sdf::SDF>) () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
#5  0x00007ffff712ac99 in gazebo::physics::World::ProcessFactoryMsgs() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#6  0x00007ffff712ccde in gazebo::physics::World::ProcessMessages() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#7  0x00007ffff712d2e8 in gazebo::physics::World::Step() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#8  0x00007ffff712f79c in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#9  0x00007ffff5cf4ce9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#10 0x00007ffff685ce9a in start_thread () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#11 0x00007ffff509dccd in clone () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6
#12 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
```
content.html:
When spawning URDF model (Baxter) using the spawn_model python -> gazebo_ros_api_plugin.cpp -> Gazebo, I get the following seg fault:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff3ffff700 (LWP 9249)]
0x00007ffff7689700 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateVisuals(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff7689700 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateVisuals(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#1  0x00007ffff768fd71 in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateLink(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>, gazebo::math::Pose&) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#2  0x00007ffff76903ab in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::CreateSDF(TiXmlElement*, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Link const>, gazebo::math::Pose const&) ()
   from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#3  0x00007ffff769420a in urdf2gazebo::URDF2Gazebo::InitModelString(std::string const&, bool) () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
#4  0x00007ffff766f0bc in sdf::readString(std::string const&, boost::shared_ptr<sdf::SDF>) () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
#5  0x00007ffff712ac99 in gazebo::physics::World::ProcessFactoryMsgs() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#6  0x00007ffff712ccde in gazebo::physics::World::ProcessMessages() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#7  0x00007ffff712d2e8 in gazebo::physics::World::Step() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
#8  0x00007ffff712f79c in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop() () from /usr/local/lib/libgazebo_physics.so.1
